ebsOptimizedAvailable.description: Indicates whether the instance type supports Amazon EBS optimization.

ebsOptimizedByDefault.description: Indicates whether the instance type uses Amazon EBS optimization by default.

ebsStorageOnly.description: Indicates whether the instance type only supports Amazon EBS.

instanceFamilyId.description: The Amazon EC2 family and generation for the instance type.

is64BitsOnly.description: Indicates whether the instance type only supports 64-bit architecture.

memoryGb.description: Memory that is available to Amazon EMR from the instance type.

numberOfDisks.description: Number of disks for the instance type.

storageGb.description: Storage capacity of the instance type.

type.description: Amazon EC2 instance type. For example, `m5.xlarge`.

vcpu.description: The number of vCPUs available for the instance type.
